text: Alexander Russell Frater (3 January 1937 â€“ 1 January 2020) was a British- Australian travel writer and journalist. He was known as 'the funniest man who wrote for Punch since the war'. Frater was best known for his books and for documentaries he wrote and produced for the BBC and ABC. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2020 deaths Category:British journalists Category:Australian journalists
title: Alexander Frater
